# Hello, World!

Welcome to my blog and this is my first post. The goal of this blog is to share ideas regarding various aspects of programming.

## Introduction outline:

- problem (one liners)
- symptoms (one liners)
- solution (one liners)

## Main idea 1: problem

- how did you notice this problem
- why does this problem persist
- why do you think so many people have resisted this?
- experts who agree with your idea

## Main idea 2: symptoms

- the dangerous of this problem
- what it looks like
- things you might not have realised as part of this problem

## Main idea 3: solution

- what the world might looklike the problem
- who will benefit when the problem is solved
- pontential pitfalls to still watch out for
- short how to

Conclusion

- reiterate your main points
- how will reader's life change?

## Main idea 3: solution
